column2: US Well Services, Inc. engages in the provision of high-pressure and hydraulic fracturing services in oil and natural gas basins. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 856 full-time employees. The company also provides high-pressure hydraulic fracturing services in unconventional oil and natural gas basins. Its technology includes PowerPath, FRAC MD, SANDSHIELD, OPTI-FLEX and Clean Fleet. PowerPath technology provides high voltage 13,800 volt electrical power for remote hydraulic fracturing operations. FRAC MD technology reduces non-productive time and increase safe stages per day by mitigating premature failures of its equipment. SANDSHIELD technology mitigates silica emissions below permissible exposure limit. OPTI-FLEX is designed to simplify and extend the capabilities of traditional fracturing fluid systems. Clean Fleet technology decrease sound pollution. Due to no notification, update was not captured previously.
